definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to lower oneself to sb's level/to argue with sb less well-informed
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: general trade (i.e. importing and export without processing)

sentences.english: At the end of the term, you typically get no cash back.
sentences.chinese: 固定年限到期后，你一般不会得到任何现金返还。

sentences.english: These arenormally sedate affairs where empty chairs outnumber the audience.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，空椅子比听众多是读书会上很平常的事。

sentences.english: The team of contributors is generally responsible for the project area and everything in it.
sentences.chinese: 贡献者组成的团队一般负责该项目区域和其中的一切。

sentences.english: Scientists find that hard-working people live longer than average men and women.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们发现努力工作的人比一般的人更有生活。

sentences.english: Accelerators are generally used in near-surface applications in which the temperature is relatively low.
sentences.chinese: 速凝剂一般在温度相对较低的接近地面的情况下使用。

sentences.english: Cold store is used to control temperature of strawberry.
sentences.chinese: 控制温度一般通过冷藏库实现。

sentences.english: The patient individualizes commonly blemish, psychogenic disorder duration is in less than of half an year.
sentences.chinese: 病人一般有个性缺陷，心理障碍持续时间在半年以内。

sentences.english: We've learned more general things about parametric equations of curves.
sentences.chinese: 我们还了解了，曲线参数方程更一般的性质。

sentences.english: To replace a standard tracheostomy tube.
sentences.chinese: 替换一般标准型气切管。

sentences.english: This chapter of Tao Te Ching is usually being called Great Conformity.
sentences.chinese: 这篇道德经一般人称之谓大顺。

sentences.english: Can run- of -mill skin contusion use gentian violet?
sentences.chinese: 一般性皮肤挫伤能不能用紫药水？

sentences.english: The two traditions have coexisted in the country, region, and generally within the same individual.
sentences.chinese: 这两个传统并存的国家，地区，一般在同一个人。

sentences.english: If you have two or three parts in your sermon, they should be generally balanced in length.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的讲章有两到三个段落，段落长度一般要平衡。

sentences.english: Touchscreens are generally considered the next step in HIDD human driven interfaces.
sentences.chinese: 触摸屏一般被认为是下一步HIDD人力驱动接口。

sentences.english: This text uses the general method, have confirmed Ferranini's marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本文用一般方法，确定了法尼尼家居中心的营销战略。

definition: for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
usually/in many cases/more often than not
in large part/the greater part/the majority
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
